name: Eiffel Tower
description: A wrought-iron lattice tower located on the Champ de Mars in Paris, France.

name: Great Wall of China
description: An ancient wall built to protect China from invasions, stretching thousands of miles.

name: Colosseum
description: An ancient amphitheater in the center of Rome, Italy, known for gladiatorial battles.

name: Machu Picchu
description: A 15th-century Inca citadel located in the Andes Mountains in Peru.

name: Taj Mahal
description: A white marble mausoleum built by Mughal Emperor Shah Jahan in memory of his wife.

name: Statue of Liberty
description: A colossal neoclassical sculpture on Liberty Island in New York Harbor.

name: Christ the Redeemer
description: An iconic statue of Jesus Christ in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil, atop Mount Corcovado.

name: Sydney Opera House
description: A multi-venue performing arts center with unique architectural design.

name: Pyramids of Giza
description: Ancient pyramids built as tombs for Egyptian pharaohs, located near Cairo.

name: Niagara Falls
description: Three massive waterfalls on the border between Canada and the USA.
